channel.title: Ake Enjeru Village - Join us!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ake Enjeru Village - Join us!" - Our country needs you!

item.title: Ake Enjeru Village - Join us!
item.content:encoded:
We're accepting any ninja from any ninja rank.

We have Genin and Chuunin Training Schools and other things that I can't revealâ€¦ war secrets.
Current Tax is 25%.

I'm the Akekage, we follow basically 3 rules:

1 - Genins and Chuunins must collect.
2 - Others must patrol.
3 - Have Fun! (most important! Not to fulfill this rule is a serious infraction to the principles of the village!)
